channel.title: Beautifully Bandaged - Devoid of Joy
channel.description:
Something not overly aggressive or abrasive. Ell I even threw some melodies in this track lol. If ya listen let me know what ya think
https://soundcloud.com/devoidofjoy/beautifully-bandaged

item.title: Beautifully Bandaged - Devoid of Joy
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I meant to listen to this earlier but things are always so hectic, this reminds me of the good old Silent Hill 1 OST. So aggressive, but always wistful, melancholic melodic stuff sprinkled in there. Great stuff!
